hackeRnews 0.1.0
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • HackeRnews - specification

Hacker News latest ask stories

Source: R/api.R
get_latest_ask_stories.Rd

Retrieves latest ask stories using Hacker News API

get_latest_ask_stories(max_items = NULL)

Arguments

max_items

Maximum number of items to retrieve. If max_items = NULL, returns all available

Value

list of latest ask HN stories ids

Details

Parallel api requests can be enabled by running future::plan(future::multiprocess)

Examples


# \donttest{
# get the lastest ask story on Hacker News
latest_ask_story <- get_latest_ask_stories(max_items = 1)
latest_ask_story
#> [[1]]
#> List of 9
#>  $ by         : chr "yolo42"
#>  $ descendants: int 154
#>  $ id         : int 21786111
#>  $ kids       : int [1:43] 21787359 21789293 21786329 21788992 21789209 21788907 21789189 21787465 21787014 21789157 ...
#>  $ score      : int 130
#>  $ text       : chr "Hello everyone,<p>I created product on the side as a side project in my own time and it has become a huge hit i"| __truncated__
#>  $ time       : POSIXct[1:1], format: "2019-12-13 23:16:17"
#>  $ title      : chr "Ask HN: My company wants my side project. What can I do?"
#>  $ type       : chr "story"
#>  - attr(*, "class")= chr "hn_item"
#> 

# get 10 latest ask stories on Hacker News
latest_10_ask_stories <- get_latest_ask_stories(max_items = 10)
